data.text: (…huh? Why am I looking at the ceiling…?)
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>(…huh? Why am I looking at the ceiling…?)

data.text: Have you come to your senses, Trainer-san?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Have you come to your senses, Trainer-san?

data.text: McQueen…? This is… the school infirmary…?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>McQueen…? This is… the school infirmary…?

data.text:
Lately, I knew you were staying late working on something, 
but I never thought you'd keep going until you collapsed.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Lately, I knew you were staying late working on something, 
<story>but I never thought you'd keep going until you collapsed.

data.text:
I must have been pushing myself way too 
hard, it sounds like I collapsed.
data.processed:
<story>I must have been pushing myself way too 
<story>hard, it sounds like I collapsed.

data.text:
Luckily, nothing too serious seems to have happened. 
…So, why have you been exerting yourself to 
the point where you would collapse?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Luckily, nothing too serious seems to have happened. 
<story>…So, why have you been exerting yourself to 
<story>the point where you would collapse?

data.text:
That's… There was just something 
I needed to investigate to help Suzuka win…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>That's… There was just something 
<story>I needed to investigate to help Suzuka win…

data.text: To help Suzuka win?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>To help Suzuka win?

data.text:
Considering Suzuka-san's current condition, there 
doesn't seem to be anything that should cause that 
much worry… is that really the reason?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Considering Suzuka-san's current condition, there 
<story>doesn't seem to be anything that should cause that 
<story>much worry… is that really the reason?

data.text:
To help her win isn't a lie, but it's not the whole truth either. 
She saw through that half-hearted answer almost immediately.
data.processed:
<story>To help her win isn't a lie, but it's not the whole truth either. 
<story>She saw through that half-hearted answer almost immediately.

data.text:
After causing you to worry that much, 
I guess I can't stay quiet…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>After causing you to worry that much, 
<story>I guess I can't stay quiet…

data.text:
After causing you to worry that much, 
I guess I can't stay quiet…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>After causing you to worry that much, 
<story>I guess I can't stay quiet…

data.text: The risks of Suzuka-san's running style…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>The risks of Suzuka-san's running style…

data.text:
Suzuka's running-style is truly dream-like. Even I can hardly 
control how excited I am to see her next race.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka's running-style is truly dream-like. Even I can hardly 
<story>control how excited I am to see her next race.

data.text:
But, I can't help wondering. What lies ahead for Suzuka… 
with that overwhelming running style.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But, I can't help wondering. What lies ahead for Suzuka… 
<story>with that overwhelming running style.

data.text:
But, I can't help wondering. What lies ahead for Suzuka… 
with that overwhelming running style.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But, I can't help wondering. What lies ahead for Suzuka… 
<story>with that overwhelming running style.

data.text:
…what might happen to her in the worst case. 
That's what you want to say, isn't it?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>…what might happen to her in the worst case. 
<story>That's what you want to say, isn't it?

data.text:
Of course. I absolutely refuse to let anything like that happen. 
But, I can't figure out… what I can do right now…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Of course. I absolutely refuse to let anything like that happen. 
<story>But, I can't figure out… what I can do right now…

data.text:
Of course. I absolutely refuse to let anything like that happen. 
But, I can't figure out… what I can do right now…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Of course. I absolutely refuse to let anything like that happen. 
<story>But, I can't figure out… what I can do right now…

data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: How about this for a start? Take a moment… and just relax.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>How about this for a start? Take a moment… and just relax.

data.text: McQueen…
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>McQueen…

data.text: Trainer-san, I don't believe that that worst case will happen.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, I don't believe that that worst case will happen.

data.text:
Trainer-san, have you ever heard this before? 
Uma Musume bear many "feelings" as they run.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, have you ever heard this before? 
<story>Uma Musume bear many "feelings" as they run.

data.text:
I think Agnes Tachyon said something like that. 
Uma Musume bear "feelings" as they run, she said.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I think Agnes Tachyon said something like that. 
<story>Uma Musume bear "feelings" as they run, she said.

data.text:
In the process of fulfilling their dreams, Uma Musume will often 
feel that they are approaching their limits. Sometimes 
physically, and sometimes mentally.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>In the process of fulfilling their dreams, Uma Musume will often 
<story>feel that they are approaching their limits. Sometimes 
<story>physically, and sometimes mentally.

data.text:
Anymore than this is impossible, anymore than this is my limit. 
Even I've felt that many times. It's probably the same for 
everyone else in ＜Sirius＞ too.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Anymore than this is impossible, anymore than this is my limit. 
<story>Even I've felt that many times. It's probably the same for 
<story>everyone else in ＜Sirius＞ too.

data.text:
However, overcoming that is what it means to be an "Uma Musume". 
Once you've overcome it once, it no longer remains a limit.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>However, overcoming that is what it means to be an "Uma Musume". 
<story>Once you've overcome it once, it no longer remains a limit.

data.text:
Those who believe in us, and together with us, 
chase our dreams. As long as we have those "feelings", 
"Uma Musume" can do anything.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Those who believe in us, and together with us, 
<story>chase our dreams. As long as we have those "feelings", 
<story>"Uma Musume" can do anything.

data.text: After all, aren't you the one that proved that to us?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>After all, aren't you the one that proved that to us?

data.text: I did…?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>I did…?

data.text: I did…?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>I did…?

data.text:
When we were on the verge of breaking, who was it that supported 
us? When we were chasing after our dreams, who was it that saw 
them together with us?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>When we were on the verge of breaking, who was it that supported 
<story>us? When we were chasing after our dreams, who was it that saw 
<story>them together with us?

data.text:
Trainer-san was always there by our side, that's why 
we were able to make it to where we are now.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san was always there by our side, that's why 
<story>we were able to make it to where we are now.

data.text: You granted us dreams that we could never have envisioned before.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>You granted us dreams that we could never have envisioned before.

data.text:
To devote so much to just one team member, 
I'm truly thankful.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>To devote so much to just one team member, 
<story>I'm truly thankful.

data.text:
Even with that, I'll show you that I can continue running while 
bearing everyone's expectations! As the team's "Ace"!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Even with that, I'll show you that I can continue running while 
<story>bearing everyone's expectations! As the team's "Ace"!

data.text: Even Rice… wants to win!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Even Rice… wants to win!

data.text:
That's why, for the sake of everyone's smiling faces, 
I'll do my best in today's race, too.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>That's why, for the sake of everyone's smiling faces, 
<story>I'll do my best in today's race, too.

data.text:
I want to win! It's been my dream ever since I was small! I'm 
scared, but there's no way I'm going to give up!! UWAAAAAAHH—!!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>I want to win! It's been my dream ever since I was small! I'm 
<story>scared, but there's no way I'm going to give up!! UWAAAAAAHH—!!

data.text:
Of course! From now on, let's continue running together, all 3 of 
us! Alright! Let's aim for what comes after the Derby~!!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Of course! From now on, let's continue running together, all 3 of 
<story>us! Alright! Let's aim for what comes after the Derby~!!

data.text:
With this much support, and the desire for 
victory - these feelings won't waver!
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>With this much support, and the desire for 
<story>victory - these feelings won't waver!

data.text:
However, I don't intend to be satisfied with just this. 
With this longing to run, I will continue to move forward.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>However, I don't intend to be satisfied with just this. 
<story>With this longing to run, I will continue to move forward.

data.text:
Even if Suzuka-san's path leads her to her limits, everything 
will certainly be fine. Without fail, she will overcome.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Even if Suzuka-san's path leads her to her limits, everything 
<story>will certainly be fine. Without fail, she will overcome.

data.text:
After all, Trainer-san you've entrusted such strong "feelings", 
to Suzuka-san.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>After all, Trainer-san you've entrusted such strong "feelings", 
<story>to Suzuka-san.

data.text:
Mejiro McQueen and the other members. No matter how many times 
they reached their limits, every time, they eventually overcome 
and grasp their dreams.
data.processed:
<story>Mejiro McQueen and the other members. No matter how many times 
<story>they reached their limits, every time, they eventually overcome 
<story>and grasp their dreams.

data.text:
That's how I've lived as a trainer. Believing in, supporting, and 
gently giving them the push forward they need.
data.processed:
<story>That's how I've lived as a trainer. Believing in, supporting, and 
<story>gently giving them the push forward they need.

data.text:
That's how I've lived as a trainer. Believing in, supporting, and 
gently giving them the push forward they need.
data.processed:
<story>That's how I've lived as a trainer. Believing in, supporting, and 
<story>gently giving them the push forward they need.

data.text:
In that case, the one thing I should be doing for Silence Suzuka, 
isn't increasing the number of anxieties she has, I need to-

choices.text: Look at the "scenery" that Suzuka is showing me!
choices.processed: <size=33>Look at the "scenery" that Suzuka is showing me!</size>

choices.text: Look at the "scenery" that Suzuka is showing me!
choices.processed: <size=33>Look at the "scenery" that Suzuka is showing me!</size>

<story>isn't increasing the number of anxieties she has, I need to-

In that case, the one thing I should be doing for Silence Suzuka,

choices.text: Look at the "scenery" that Suzuka is showing me!
choices.processed: <size=33>Look at the "scenery" that Suzuka is showing me!</size>

choices.processed: <size=33>Look at the "scenery" that Suzuka is showing me!</size>

data.processed:
<story>In that case, the one thing I should be doing for Silence Suzuka, 
<story>isn't increasing the number of anxieties she has, I need to-

data.text:
If it's Suzuka-san, she's probably still running on the course. 
Please, go give her that gentle push.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>If it's Suzuka-san, she's probably still running on the course. 
<story>Please, go give her that gentle push.

data.text:
Silence Suzuka came to this team, believing in me. And then for 
the sake of seeing that "scenery" together, she ran.
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka came to this team, believing in me. And then for 
<story>the sake of seeing that "scenery" together, she ran.

data.text:
Silence Suzuka came to this team, believing in me. And then for 
the sake of seeing that "scenery" together, she ran.
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka came to this team, believing in me. And then for 
<story>the sake of seeing that "scenery" together, she ran.

data.text:
Even with that, I spent so much time continuing to worry about 
her not being able to run, that I lost sight of that "scenery"-
data.processed:
<story>Even with that, I spent so much time continuing to worry about 
<story>her not being able to run, that I lost sight of that "scenery"-

data.text:
Even with that, I spent so much time continuing to worry about 
her not being able to run, that I lost sight of that "scenery"-
data.processed:
<story>Even with that, I spent so much time continuing to worry about 
<story>her not being able to run, that I lost sight of that "scenery"-

data.text: Suzuka…!!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Suzuka…!!

data.text: Trainer-san…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san…?

data.text: Suzuka, I have something I need to apologize for.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Suzuka, I have something I need to apologize for.

data.text: Suzuka, I have something I need to apologize for.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Suzuka, I have something I need to apologize for.

data.text:
This whole time I've been teaching you how to run and train. 
…But, I didn't tell you the most important thing.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>This whole time I've been teaching you how to run and train. 
<story>…But, I didn't tell you the most important thing.

data.text:
This whole time I've been teaching you how to run and train. 
…But, I didn't tell you the most important thing.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>This whole time I've been teaching you how to run and train. 
<story>…But, I didn't tell you the most important thing.

data.text: The most important thing… is it?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>The most important thing… is it?

data.text:
Just seeing you fulfilled was more than enough. Just seeing you 
like that, greatly expanded my hopes and expectations.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just seeing you fulfilled was more than enough. Just seeing you 
<story>like that, greatly expanded my hopes and expectations.

data.text:
Just seeing you fulfilled was more than enough. Just seeing you 
like that, greatly expanded my hopes and expectations.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just seeing you fulfilled was more than enough. Just seeing you 
<story>like that, greatly expanded my hopes and expectations.

data.text:
But, at the same time my worries grew. I started thinking that 
your body couldn't endure that running style…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But, at the same time my worries grew. I started thinking that 
<story>your body couldn't endure that running style…

data.text:
But, at the same time my worries grew. I started thinking that 
your body couldn't endure that running style…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But, at the same time my worries grew. I started thinking that 
<story>your body couldn't endure that running style…

data.text:
The more I watched you run, the more the worst case started 
looking like the most likely case.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>The more I watched you run, the more the worst case started 
<story>looking like the most likely case.

data.text:
The more I watched you run, the more the worst case started 
looking like the most likely case.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>The more I watched you run, the more the worst case started 
<story>looking like the most likely case.

data.text:
That's the reason Trainer-san was uneasy… 
You were worried about me…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>That's the reason Trainer-san was uneasy… 
<story>You were worried about me…

data.text:
But that's the same as not believing in you. 
I started believing you wouldn't be able to continue running.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But that's the same as not believing in you. 
<story>I started believing you wouldn't be able to continue running.

data.text:
But that's the same as not believing in you. 
I started believing you wouldn't be able to continue running.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But that's the same as not believing in you. 
<story>I started believing you wouldn't be able to continue running.

data.text:
Suzuka… I want to go with you wherever you go. 
I want to see that "scenery" we promised to see together!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka… I want to go with you wherever you go. 
<story>I want to see that "scenery" we promised to see together!

data.text:
Suzuka… I want to go with you wherever you go. 
I want to see that "scenery" we promised to see together!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka… I want to go with you wherever you go. 
<story>I want to see that "scenery" we promised to see together!

data.text:
That's why, I believe in you! The only thing I need to do as a 
trainer, is believe in you! That's why-
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Run to your heart's content, Suzuka!!
Run to your heart's content, Suzuka!!

data.processed:
<story>That's why, I believe in you! The only thing I need to do as a 
<story>trainer, is believe in you! That's why-

That's why, I believe in you! The only thing I need to do as a

data.name: <username>

choices.text: Run to your heart's content, Suzuka!!
Run to your heart's content, Suzuka!!

data.processed:
<story>That's why, I believe in you! The only thing I need to do as a

data.text: Trainer-san…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san…

data.text:
…understood. I'll run to my heart's content. From now on, I'll 
continue to run in front to the goal, and take hold of my dream.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…understood. I'll run to my heart's content. From now on, I'll 
<story>continue to run in front to the goal, and take hold of my dream.

data.text: Because I believe in Trainer-san too.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Because I believe in Trainer-san too.

data.text:
Thinking about it calmly, we both said some embarassing things 
just now- but those words blew away all those worries.
data.processed:
<story>Thinking about it calmly, we both said some embarassing things 
<story>just now- but those words blew away all those worries.

data.text:
Can you promise me one more thing? Continue running in front to 
the goal, and after that, without fail-
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Without fail, return to my side.
Without fail, return to my side.

data.processed:
<story>Can you promise me one more thing? Continue running in front to 
<story>the goal, and after that, without fail-

data.text:
Can you promise me one more thing? Continue running in front to 
the goal, and after that, without fail-
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Without fail, return to my side.
Without fail, return to my side.

data.processed:
<story>Can you promise me one more thing? Continue running in front to 
<story>the goal, and after that, without fail-

data.text:
…Of course. 
I've received Trainer-san's "feelings", after all.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…Of course. 
<story>I've received Trainer-san's "feelings", after all.

data.text: I promise, that I'll definitely return.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>I promise, that I'll definitely return.

data.text:
They round the final corner, entering the final straight! 
In the lead is Silence Suzuka! But the others are closing in!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>They round the final corner, entering the final straight! 
<story>In the lead is Silence Suzuka! But the others are closing in!!

data.text:
Air Groove, from the outside! Air Groove closes the gap!! 
Will the lead change here?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Air Groove, from the outside! Air Groove closes the gap!! 
<story>Will the lead change here?!

data.text:
But she won't give up the lead! Silence Suzuka, it's Silence 
Suzuka! Entering the last straight her pace doesn't falter!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>But she won't give up the lead! Silence Suzuka, it's Silence 
<story>Suzuka! Entering the last straight her pace doesn't falter!

data.text:
Silence Suzuka, now - crosses the goal!! With her 
"Escape and Follow Through", she's splendidly put 
her hands on this grand prix trophy!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka, now - crosses the goal!! With her 
<story>"Escape and Follow Through", she's splendidly put 
<story>her hands on this grand prix trophy!!

data.text: Those we call "Uma Musume", run bearing our "feelings" with them-
data.processed: <story>Those we call "Uma Musume", run bearing our "feelings" with them-

data.text:
Without a doubt, in today's race, 
it felt like I was there running beside Silence Suzuka.
data.processed:
<story>Without a doubt, in today's race, 
<story>it felt like I was there running beside Silence Suzuka.
